title: Uniform approximations for bodies with defects and asymptotics of Green's kernels for singularly perturbed domains
abstractText: The issue of uniform asymptotic approximations for Green's kernelsin singularly perturbed domains has been addressed for the firsttime in the recent papers by the authors of this proposal. Themain challenge in this work is the presence of singularities ofthe Green's kernels, which make the known asymptotic methodsinefficient and require additional analysis.
